data.meta_description: After secretly dating for years, Bollywood actors Aishwarya Rai Abhishek Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan made their relationship official and had an intimate wedding in Mumbai on April 20, 2007. On their 16th wedding anniversary today, let’s take a look at the couple’s adorable moments together.
data.text:
Abhishek & Aishwarya’s wedding anniversary

This day marks 16 years of marriage for Abhishek and Aishwarya. On the duo’s wedding anniversary, let’s take a trip down memory lane from where it all started.

Their first meeting

Aishwarya and Abhishek met for the first time in 1999 for a photo shoot for their first film, ‘Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke’. They liked each other‘s company and remained friends after.

How did love happen?

Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan did many more films together. They reportedly developed feelings for each other during 2005-06, when they were shooting for ‘Umrao Jaan’.

The perfect proposal

In an interview with Oprah Winfrey, Abhishek revealed how, in 2007, he decided to propose to Aishwarya on a hotel balcony.

The wedding day

After the dreamy proposal, they decided to get married in an Indian wedding ceremony on April 20, 2007. The celebrity wedding was the talk of Bollywood at the time.

Their Cannes appearance

One of the most popular Bollywood couples, they marked their presence at the Cannes Film Festival back in 2009, looking as beautiful and sharp as always.

Welcoming Aaradhya

After four years of their marriage, the two became proud parents of their daughter, Aaradhya Bachchan.
